MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Primavera Project in Central America, Nicaragua dated January 2017.pdf

state_or_province.observed_name: Región Autónoma de la Costa Caribe Norte

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Primavera Project in Central America, Nicaragua dated January 2017.pdf
document.description: This technical report, prepared by WSP Canada Inc. and commissioned by Calibre Mining Corp., presents a resource estimate and geological analysis for the Primavera Project located in north-central Nicaragua, and includes recommendations for further exploration and development actions.
